name: Evil day - Part 1
description:
This game is based on the story "EVIL DAY" (2007 Powerpoint game):

You and your friend play ouija, the scary happens, follow the path and discover what happened.

**Game mode:
Touch the area with flashes where you want to advance.

** Precautions:
This game, originally based on scare-screens is NOT suitable for sensitive.

** Adjust maximum volume of the device, the spirits can give you clues at any time.

-This Saga is also available in Android!-
